params.amounts: : Amount of each coin being deposited
params.min_mint_amount: : Minimum amount of LP tokens to mint from the deposit

params.amounts: : Amount of each coin being deposited
params.deposit: : Set True for deposits, False for withdrawals

params._token_amount: : Amount of LP tokens to burn in the withdrawal
params.i: : Index value of the coin to withdraw

params.dx: : Amount of coin i to swap
params.i: : Index of coin to swap from
params.j: : Index of coin to swap to
params.min_dy: : 	Minimum amount of j to receive

params.dx: : Amount of coin i to swap
params.i: : Index of coin to swap from
params.j: : Index of coin to swap to

params.dx: Amount of coin i to swap
params.i: Index of coin to swap from
params.j: Index of coin to swap to

params._amount: : Quantity of LP tokens to burn in the withdrawal
params.min_amounts: : Minimum amounts of underlying coins to receive

params.amounts: : List of amounts of underlying coins to withdraw
params.max_burn_amount: : Maximum amount of LP token to burn in the withdrawal

params._token_amount: : Amount of LP tokens to burn in the withdrawal
params.i: : Index value of the coin to withdraw
params.min_amount: : Minimum amount of coin to receive

A().notice: Getter for the amplification coefficient of the pool. The amplification coefficient A determines a pool’s tolerance for imbalance between the assets within it.

N_COINS().notice: Get the number of coins within the pool

PRECISION_MUL(uint256).notice: Get the precision multipliers for each coin in the pool

RATES(uint256).notice: Get the exchange rates for each coin in the pool

admin_fee().notice: The percentage of the swap fee that is taken as an admin fee. The method returns an integer with with 1e10 precision.

balances(uint256).notice: Get the balances of each coin in the pool

calc_token_amount(uint256[2],bool).notice: Calculate addition or reduction in token supply from a deposit or withdrawal Returns the expected amount of LP tokens received.  This calculation accounts for slippage, but not fees.

calc_withdraw_one_coin(uint256,uint256).notice: Calculate the amount received when withdrawing a single coin.

coins(uint256).notice: Get the address of coin in the pool

exchange(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256.notice: Perform an exchange between two coins.

fee().notice: The pool swap fee. The method returns fee as an integer with 1e10 precision.

get_dy(uint256,uint256,uint256).notice: Get the amount of coin j one would receive for swapping dx of coin i.

get_dy_underlying(uint256,uint256,uint25.notice: Get the amount of coin j one would receive for swapping dx of coin i, in underlying units.

get_virtual_price().notice: Current virtual price of the pool LP token relative to the underlying pool assets. Can get the absolute price by multiplying it with the price of the underlying assets. The method returns virtual_price as an integer with 1e18 precision.

remove_liquidity_imbalance(uint256[2],ui.notice: Withdraw coins from the pool in an imbalanced amount

remove_liquidity_one_coin(uint256,uint25.notice: Withdraw a single coin from the pool

token().notice: Get the LP token of the two pool
